General.Name: Veken Elite
General.Description: Veken Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of lithium batteries. The company offers 3C digital batteries for use in electronic products, such as notebooks, laptops, education computers, and personable wearables; and power batteries, such as soft packaged and aluminum shell power batteries for passenger auto battery, special vehicle battery, home appliance battery, and energy storage battery applications. It serves cellphone brands and communication operators in China, Europe, and the United States. Veken Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Ningbo, China.
